typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Max ID Seuil} as string,
		{Contrepartie seuil} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> seuil
source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		year as string,
		ca as string,
		{Réalisé} as string,
		{Somme quantité} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> remuneration
seuil, remuneration join(seuil@{ID contrat cadre} == remuneration@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& seuil@{ID contrat} == remuneration@{ID contrat}
	&& seuil@{ID levier} == remuneration@{ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoin
dropColumns derive({Rémunération} = toDouble({Réalisé})*toDouble({Contrepartie seuil})) ~> remunerationColumn
innerJoin select(mapColumn(
		year = seuil@year,
		{ID contrat cadre} = seuil@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = seuil@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = seuil@{ID levier},
		{ID Seuil} = {Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil},
		ca,
		{Réalisé},
		{Somme quantité}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
remunerationColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CONTRAT_DISTRIBUTION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CONTRATDISTRIBUTION

		ca_factur_ = toFloat(ca_factur_)) ~> DerivedColumn1
ecoulementReplicated derive(qte = iif( qte_ecoulement<=0 , -1, 1)) ~> computation
computation derive(ca_ecoulement = qte*ca_ecoulement,
		indexcol1 = agence_code+"-"+reference,
		rcount = 1) ~> createIndex

		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
RenameLeft derive(ca_final = toDouble(ca_ecoulement),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_ecc ),
		data_origin = "ecoulement",
		id_canal_final = 42) ~> caFinal
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLeft
fullLeft filter(isNull(renameAvoir@indexcols2)) ~> outerLeft
ecoulementwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoiceEcoulement
avoirwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameAvoir
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerAvoir
innerAvoir derive(canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP", 
    iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC"))) ~> canal
canal derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45, 
    iif(canal=="FS", 51, 
    iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		ca_final = toDouble(qte_avoir)*toDouble(ca_avoir),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_avoir)) ~> idCanal
idCanal derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", 'Diffus'),
		data_origin = "ecoulement_retraité") ~> idCanalFinal
stgOffre select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre = Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = CodeATC,
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NoOffre,
		{ATC Performance}),
	Canal = max(Canal)) ~> uniqueOffre
idCanalFinal, uniqueOffre join(renameAvoir@NoOffre == uniqueOffre@NoOffre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOffre
dropColumns select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndInner
caFinal, EndInner union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id = marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> keepColumns
referentielATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> atcKeepingColumn
atcKeepingColumn filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> atcNotNull
atcNotNull aggregate(groupBy(code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		Marque),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> uniqueATC
keepColumns, uniqueATC join({Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftATC
dropColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumn
facturation derive(qt_cd_e = toInteger(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		qt_livr_e = toInteger(qt_livr_e),
		qt_factur_e = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		ca_livr_ = toDouble(ca_livr_),
		ca_factur_ = toDouble(ca_factur_)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth),
	qt_cd_e = sum(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = sum(ca_cd_),
		qt_livr_e = sum(qt_livr_e),
		ca_livr_ = sum(ca_livr_),
		qt_factur_e = sum(qt_factur_e),
		ca_factur_ = sum(ca_factur_),
		{Canal distribution} = first({Canal distribution}),
		{Org commerciale} = first({Org commerciale}),
		{recept de march} = first({recept de march})) ~> Aggregate2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		article = reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e = qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_ = ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e = qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_ = ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e = qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_ = ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin

		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qt� vente directe}),
